page.title: 03TOFT HILL HALL FARM
page.content: Toft Hill Hall Farm is a marginal grass land farm of some 230 acres (100 hectares). It is owned by Mr N E Raw who lives there with his wife and 2 grown up sons. It is situated just off the main A68 road as it leaves Toft Hill for Witton-le-Wear. Most of the farmland is on the sloping valley side of the River Wear facing North. Although the deeds to the farmhouse have been lost, we have a clue that probably dates the house in the 18th century. The upper windows of the house have been blocked up and pretend windows painted on the outside, to avoid the payment of taxes which were introduced on windows between 1696 and 1851.
